subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The second half of the season did not begin with a reawakening from Cano, who was hitless in four at-bats as the Yankees beat the Mariners after Rodriguez’s tiebreaking, seventh-inning home run.
snippet: The second half of the season did not begin with a reawakening from Cano, who was hitless in four at-bats as the Yankees beat the Mariners after Rodriguez’s tiebreaking, seventh-inning home run.
